pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-4845: Refine filtered results so nested elements with no filtered results do not appear
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
This PR implements the feature given in the ticket DHFPROD-4845.
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText: lets initialize resetSearch here. all the elements here, to go with arrange/act/assert way of writing tests.
Click will assert that element to be in the dom. We can get rid of the assertion here, line 60, 62 and other places if present.
All the "not" here are siblings right?
